ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnvxp | |- `' ( A X. B ) = ( B X. A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cnvexg | |- ( ( A X. B ) e. _V -> `' ( A X. B ) e. _V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( ( A X. B ) e. _V -> ( B X. A ) e. _V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnvxp | |- `' ( B X. A ) = ( A X. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnvexg | |- ( ( B X. A ) e. _V -> `' ( B X. A ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( ( B X. A ) e. _V -> ( A X. B ) e. _V ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_impbii | |- ( ( A X. B ) e. _V <-> ( B X. A ) e. _V ) |
